name: Core_StringBuffer_insertFv
signature: Core_Result Core_StringBuffer_insertFv(Core_StringBuffer* SELF, Core_Size index, Core_String* format, va_list arguments);
success: The UTF-8 Byte sequence of the @{code('Core_String')} object was appended to the UTF-8 Byte sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.
description: Append the UTF-8 Byte sequence of a @{code('Core_String')} object to the UTF-8 Byte sequence of this @{code('Core_StringBuffer')} object.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
